ing: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, room temperature
des: "Cream cheese is combined with real flower petals and other flavors to make a great spread. Put on bagels, crackers, bread, fruits or vegetables. Be sure your flowers have not been sprayed with pesticides and are thoroughly cleansed."
ins: In a medium bowl, stir together the cream cheese, honey, lemon zest, rose petals, lilac petals, and marigold petals. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving to blend flavors.
